## Objective
Compare engagement across platforms.

```{r}
social <- data.frame(
  Platform = c("Facebook","Instagram","Twitter","LinkedIn"),
  Engagement = c(120,300,90,150)
)
barplot(social$Engagement, names.arg = social$Platform)
```
